title: Person of Interest 2x13 My past is catching up with me
author: George Finch
comment: I loved this episode on how u truly see the love that Carter has for John and he has for her beautiful

I hated Kara doing that to John and Snow. Revenge never solves anything. If she was smart she should of ask John, what went wrong. Why where they burned? John had all the answers. That's what happens when you don't ask Q.       Chirp
It should be pointed out that when Snow left in the elevator, Reese shot to kill.
That's a damn good careese moment 😍😍😍
description: Person of Interest 2x13 My past is catching up with me
